author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Naturally, fans are excitingly looking forward to the release of Avengers: Doomsday. The upcoming MCU project promises to be one of the studio’s biggest projects to date, alongside Avengers: Secret Wars, though some fans have taken their excitement a little too far. In addition to one leaker, who appears to have received a warning from [...]

The post ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ Leaker Receives Warning From Marvel As AI Content Fools Fans appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ Leaker Receives Warning From Marvel As AI Content Fools Fans

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe is finally circling back to Jon Bernthal’s Punisher. The character previously appeared in several Netflix shows including his own Punisher series, before being scrapped in a move by Marvel Studios, and he was later reintroduced with Daredevil: Born Again. Jon Bernthal reprised his role for the reintroduction and he’ll be doing [...]

The post Marvel Reportedly Wants Female Villain For ‘Punisher’ MCU Special appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Marvel Reportedly Wants Female Villain For ‘Punisher’ MCU Special
